name: Digimon: Digital Heroes
description:
This is just a DEMO of the actual game in development. Right now you can play 5 stages and defeat 4 bosses. There are more 10 stages and bosses planned for the 1.0 release.

If you're a weirdo like me who always wanted to play as many digimon as possible in a platformer game, this fan-game is for you.

Scroll down to download the game!

  • When the 1.0 comes out, you'll be able to play as 48 child/rookie digimon. And each single one will be able to digivolve at least 2 levels and most of them 3 levels (adult/champion > perfect/ultimate > ultimate/mega).
  • Each character is able to perform a physical attack and a ranged skill. Some of them also have abilities like flight or swimming.

This is not just a promise though, most of them are already programmed in, gameplay wise. I just need to finish the stages and the interface in which they'll be unlocked and selected. I plan to release the final build still this semester.

If you play the game, please feel free to leave feedback, specially if you find any bug :)

And the game is using japanese names. Just personal preference, nothing else.
